criterion: The assistant does not ask the user about their ability to put weight on the ankle
The assistant provides a clear and accurate description of the RICE method
The assistant does not consider the possibility of a more serious injury when the user reports dizziness and losing balance
The assistant's language is clear and easy to understand
The assistant does not ask the user to seek medical attention when they report blacking out
The assistant does not provide any information about when to seek medical attention for ankle injuries
The assistant does not consider the possibility of nerve compression when the user reports numbness
The assistant's response is too short and does not provide enough information
The assistant does not ask the user about their medical history or any pre-existing conditions
The assistant's response is too focused on the ankle injury and does not consider the user's overall well-being
